Class Constants

java.lang.Object
  robowars.Constants
public final class Constants
extends java.lang.Object

The class Constants defines a number of constants.

Constant Field Values

POWER_CONST

public static final double POWER_CONST
constant used in the calculation of bullet velocity (4/3). bullet_velocity = (Constants.POWER_CONST-bullet_power/Constants.MAX_POWER)*Constants.MAX_BULLET_VEL

See Also:
Constant Field Values

GUN_HEAT_FACTOR

public static final double GUN_HEAT_FACTOR
constant used in calculation of gun heat (10 units). gun_heat=Constants.GUN_HEAT_FACTOR*bullet_power + Constants.CONSTANT_GUN_HEAT_FACTOR

See Also:
Constant Field Values

GUN_COOLING_RATE

public static final double GUN_COOLING_RATE
returns the gun cooling rate in units/game time (1 unit/game time). You can fire a bullet only when the gun heat becomes zero.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

CONSTANT_GUN_HEAT_FACTOR

public static final double CONSTANT_GUN_HEAT_FACTOR
constant used in the calculation of gun heat(0 units). gun_heat=Constants.GUN_HEAT_FACTOR*bullet_power +Constants.CONSTANT_GUN_HEAT_FACTOR

See Also:

HIT_ROBOT_HEALTH_PENALTY

public static final double HIT_ROBOT_HEALTH_PENALTY
the health lost by the robot when hit by another robot (2 units).

See Also:
Constant Field Values

HIT_BY_BULLET_HEALTH_PENALTY

public static final double HIT_BY_BULLET_HEALTH_PENALTY
constant used in calculating health lost by a robot hit by a bullet (1.5). health_lost = Constants.HIT_BY_BULLET_HEALTH_PENALTY * (bullet power)^2 + Constants.HIT_BULLET_CONST_FACTOR

See Also:
Constant Field Values

HIT_BULLET_SCORE_BONUS

public static final double HIT_BULLET_SCORE_BONUS
constant used in calculating the points scored by the firing robot, when its bullet hits an opponent (1.5). points_scored = Constants.HIT_BULLET_SCORE_BONUS * (bullet power)^2 + Constants.HIT_BULLET_CONST_FACTOR

See Also:
Constant Field Values

HIT_BULLET_CONST_FACTOR

public static final double HIT_BULLET_CONST_FACTOR
constant used in calculating health lost by a robot hit by a bullet or points scored by the hitting robot (1 unit).

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ROUND_WIN_BONUS

public static final double ROUND_WIN_BONUS
the bonus score that a robot earns for winning a round (25 points)

See Also:
Constant Field Values

GUN_ROTATE_STEP

public static final double GUN_ROTATE_STEP
the angular velocity of the gun in radians/game time (Math.PI/40 radians/game time).

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ROUNDTIME

public static final long ROUNDTIME
the maximum duration of a round in game time units (4500). If none of the robots succeed in becoming the sole survivor by this time, the one with the greater health is declared winner of the round (and earns the round bonus).

See Also:
Constant Field Values
